question: What's the type, name, genre and premiere date of the content?
sql_query1: SELECT type, title, genre, premiereMonth FROM Content
sql_query2: SELECT type, title, genre, premiereYear FROM Content
sql_query3: SELECT type, title, genre, premiereMonth, premiereYear FROM Content
interpretation1: What's the type, name, genre and premiere month of the content?
interpretation2: What's the type, name, genre and premiere year of the content?
interpretation3: What's the type, name, genre and premiere month and year of the content?
sql_query_general: SELECT type, title, genre, Premiere_Date FROM Content

question: What is the content type, title and premiere date where user rating is equal to 5
sql_query1: Select type, title, premiereMonth FROM Content JOIN Reviews ON Reviews.Contentid=Content.id WHERE rating=5;
sql_query2: Select type, title, premiereYear FROM Content JOIN Reviews ON Reviews.Contentid=Content.id WHERE rating=5;
sql_query3: Select type, title, premiereMonth, premiereYear FROM Content JOIN Reviews ON Reviews.Contentid=Content.id WHERE rating=5;
interpretation1: What is the content type, title and premiere month where user rating is equal to 5
interpretation2: What is the content type, title and premiere year where user rating is equal to 5
interpretation3: What is the content type, title and premiere month and year where user rating is equal to 5
sql_query_general: Select type, title, Premiere_Date FROM Content JOIN Reviews ON Reviews.Contentid=Content.id WHERE rating=5;
